description: Fundamental side control position perpendicular to opponent with chest-to-chest pressure
key_points: Chest-to-chest perpendicular|Underhook far arm|Crossface with near arm|Hips low and heavy
common_mistakes: Too much space|Head too high|No crossface|Weight not distributed

description: Judo-derived position with head locked under armpit facing opponent's legs
key_points: Head locked under armpit|Far arm controls hip or belt|Near arm trapped|Heavy hip pressure
common_mistakes: Head escaping|No hip control|Weight too high|Gap under armpit
counters: Getting elbow to mat|Roll escape|Creating space

description: Maximum pressure side control with both arms far side for crushing control
key_points: Both arms on far side of opponent|Maximum chest pressure|Hips switching|Grinding pressure
common_mistakes: Not heavy enough|Hands wrong side|Too high|Allowing frames

description: Kesa variation facing opponent's legs for kimura attacks
key_points: Face opponent's legs|Head control under far arm|Hip heavy on shoulder|Arm trapped for kimura
common_mistakes: Not controlling head|Weight wrong place|Arm escaping|Poor positioning

description: Side control facing legs with legs threatening leg lock entries
key_points: Hips toward opponent's feet|Control upper body|Legs threaten attacks|Transition ready
common_mistakes: Poor control|Legs not threatening|Weight wrong|Losing position

description: Moving from side control to north-south position
key_points: From side control, walk toward head|Maintain pressure throughout|Settle in north-south|Control with chest and arms
common_mistakes: Losing pressure|Too fast|Giving space|Poor control

description: Transitioning from side control to mount position
key_points: From side control, switch hips|Slide knee across stomach|Settle into mount|Maintain control throughout
common_mistakes: Moving too fast|Losing control|Giving space|Poor timing

description: Guillotine choke set up when opponent turns in from side control
key_points: When opponent turns toward you|Wrap head and secure guillotine|Arm in or arm out variation|Finish with squeeze
common_mistakes: Head not secured|Loose grip|Poor position|No control
counters: Pulling head out|Passing to side|Going flat

description: Choke encircling opponent's head and arm from side control position
key_points: Walk near arm across face|Encircle head and arm|Lock hands palm-to-palm|Dismount and finish
common_mistakes: Arm not across|Too loose|Wrong angle|Not dismounting

description: Arm-in guillotine variation threading under armpit around neck from side
key_points: Thread arm under far armpit|Around neck and grip tricep|Walk toward their legs|Squeeze to finish
common_mistakes: Wrong arm path|Loose grip|Poor angle|Not walking

description: Collar choke from side control using far collar grip and forearm pressure
key_points: Deep far collar grip|Forearm blade across throat|Near arm controls|Drive shoulder and squeeze
common_mistakes: Grip not deep|Forearm wrong angle|No control|Loose

description: Fundamental shoulder lock attacking far arm from side control
key_points: Isolate far arm|Figure-four grip at wrist|Control elbow|Rotate arm behind back
common_mistakes: Loose grip|Not controlling elbow|Arm escaping|Poor position

description: Figure-four shoulder lock on near arm from side control position
key_points: Pin near arm wrist to mat|Figure-four grip|Keep elbow pinned|Paint wrist toward hip
common_mistakes: Elbow not pinned|Arm too straight|Loose grip|Wrong direction

description: Collar choke using baseball bat grip and spinning motion from side control or mount
key_points: Four-fingers-in far collar|Thumb-in near collar|Baseball bat grip|Spin through to finish
common_mistakes: Grips not set|Spinning wrong way|Loose grips|Poor timing

description: Variation of paper cutter with different grip configuration from heavy side control
key_points: From 100 kilos, near collar grip|Forearm across throat|Use body weight|Squeeze and press
common_mistakes: Wrong grip|Not heavy|Forearm off throat|Too high

description: Basic escape from side control using frames and hip escape
key_points: Frame on hip and shoulder/neck|Bridge up and into opponent|At peak, hip escape away|Insert knee and recover guard
common_mistakes: Flat position|Poor frames|Bridging wrong direction|Not inserting knee

description: Escape from side control by rolling through space created by frame
key_points: Frame on hip and head|When space opens, swing legs|Roll through ghost hole|Come to knees or guard
common_mistakes: No frames|Missing the hole|Slow execution|Poor timing

description: Getting to knees and wrestling up from side control using underhook
key_points: Get to side facing opponent|Establish underhook|Pop to knees|Drive for reversal or stand
common_mistakes: Flat position|No underhook|Slow|Poor base

description: Escaping kesa gatame by getting elbow down and turning
key_points: Get near elbow to mat|Reach over opponent's back|Turn belly down|Get to knees
common_mistakes: Elbow stuck|No reach|Slow turn|Giving arm

description: Taking the back when opponent turns away from side control
key_points: When opponent turns away|Follow to back|Insert hooks|Establish seatbelt control
common_mistakes: Not following|Losing control|Poor timing|No hooks

description: Transitioning from side control to knee on belly position
key_points: From side, rise to knee on belly|Maintain control with grips|Pressure with knee|Ready for attacks
common_mistakes: Losing control|Too fast|No pressure|Poor balance

description: Attacking wrist when opponent is defending from bottom side control
key_points: When opponent frames or defends|Isolate wrist|Hyperextend wrist|Apply gradual pressure
common_mistakes: Not isolating|Too fast|Wrong angle|Loose control

description: Armbar attacking near arm by stepping over from side control
key_points: Control near arm|Step over head|Sit back into armbar|Finish with hip extension
common_mistakes: Losing arm|Poor step over|Too much space|Not controlling

description: Armbar on far arm spinning to attack from side control
key_points: Control far arm|Spin over to attack|Lock legs over face|Extend hips to finish
common_mistakes: Losing arm|Slow spin|Too much space|Poor control

description: Omoplata-style shoulder lock from side control position
key_points: Isolate far arm|Use leg to control shoulder|Apply shoulder pressure|Finish like omoplata
common_mistakes: Losing arm|Poor leg position|Not enough pressure|Arm escaping
